Literature.Title: Discovery of novel antimicrobial peptides, Brevilaterin V, from Brevibacillus laterosporus S62-9 after regulated by exogenously-added L-valine.
Literature.Author: Chen Z, Wang X, Han P, Liu Y, Hong D, Li S, Ma A, Jia Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Sheep erythrocytes:4.06 ± 0.84% Hemolysis=500 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:0.11 ± 0.95% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=125 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus CICC 10269(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=1µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 51299(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=2µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC 19115(MIC=1µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii CICC 10980(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis CICC 21516(no activity data),Serratia marcescens CICC 10898(no activity data)
